00033 class POPPLER_CPP_EXPORT document : public poppler::noncopyable
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     enum page_mode_enum {
00037         use_none,
00038         use_outlines,
00039         use_thumbs,
00040         fullscreen,
00041         use_oc,
00042         use_attach
00043     };
00044 
00045     enum page_layout_enum {
00046         no_layout,
00047         single_page,
00048         one_column,
00049         two_column_left,
00050         two_column_right,
00051         two_page_left,
00052         two_page_right
00053     };
00054 
00055     ~document();
00056 
00057     bool is_locked() const;
00058     bool unlock(const std::string &owner_password, const std::string &user_password);
00059 
00060     page_mode_enum page_mode() const;
00061     page_layout_enum page_layout() const;
00062     void get_pdf_version(int *major, int *minor) const;
00063     std::vector<std::string> info_keys() const;
00064     ustring info_key(const std::string &key) const;
00065     time_type info_date(const std::string &key) const;
00066     bool is_encrypted() const;
00067     bool is_linearized() const;
00068     bool has_permission(permission_enum which) const;
00069     ustring metadata() const;
00070     bool get_pdf_id(std::string *permanent_id, std::string *update_id) const;
00071 
00072     int pages() const;
00073     page* create_page(const ustring &label) const;
00074     page* create_page(int index) const;
00075 
00076     std::vector<font_info> fonts() const;
00077     font_iterator* create_font_iterator(int start_page = 0) const;
00078 
00079     toc* create_toc() const;
00080

00083

00085                                     const std::string &owner_password = std::string(),
00086                                     const std::string &user_password = std::string());
00087     static document* load_from_data(byte_array *file_data,
00088                                     const std::string &owner_password = std::string(),
00089                                     const std::string &user_password = std::string());

00091                                         int file_data_length,

00093                                         const std::string &user_password = std::string());
